message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round, considering the inflation rates.
Alice, considering the inflation, I think a 55/45 split is more than fair. Let's settle on this before the money loses more value!
Bob, let's be realistic. The value is decreasing rapidly. I'm offering you 4200, which is more than you would have gotten in the previous round if you factor in the inflation. Take the deal!
Alice, the value is indeed decreasing, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. A 50/50 split is the fairest deal at this point. Let's shake on it!
